mapper.select: SELECT se.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, e.employee_id employeeId, se.item_name itemName, se.item_price itemPrice, se.equipment_active equipmentActive, se.createdate as createdate, se.updatedate as updatedate FROM employee e INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON e.employee_no = se.employee_no WHERE se.sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}

SELECT sports_equipment_img_file_name sportsEquipmentImgFileName, sports_equipment_img_no sportsEquipmentImgNo, sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo FROM sports_equipment_img WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE sports_equipment SET employee_no = #{employeeNo}, item_name = #{itemName}, item_price = #{itemPrice}, equipment_active = #{equipmentActive}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sports_equipment_order( branch_no, sports_equipment_no, quantity, total_price )VALUES( #{branchNo}, #{sportsEquipmentNo}, #{quantity}, #{totalPrice} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sports_equipment_order SET order_status = #{orderStatus}, updatedate = NOW() WHERE order_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT b.branch_name branchName, se.item_name itemName, se.sports_equipment_no sportsEquipmentNo, ( SELECT sei.sports_equipment_img_file_name FROM sports_equipment_img sei WHERE sei.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no ORDER BY sei.sports_equipment_img_file_name LIMIT 1 ) sportsEquipmentImgFileName, SUM(seo.quantity) AS totalQuantity, SUM(CASE WHEN seo.quantity > 0 THEN seo.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS inventoryQuantity, SUM(CASE WHEN seo.quantity < 0 THEN seo.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS discartdQuantity FROM branch b INNER JOIN sports_equipment_order seo ON b.branch_no = seo.branch_no INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no INNER JOIN sports_equipment_img sei ON se.sports_equipment_no = sei.sports_equipment_no WHERE seo.order_status = '승인'
AND b.branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBranch},'%')
AND se.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
GROUP BY b.branch_name, se.item_name, se.sports_equipment_no, sei.sports_equipment_no, sei.sports_equipment_img_file_name ORDER BY se.item_name LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT b.branch_name AS branchName FROM branch b INNER JOIN sports_equipment_order seo ON b.branch_no = seo.branch_no INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no WHERE seo.order_status = '승인'
AND b.branch_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchBranch},'%')
AND se.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query},'%')
GROUP BY b.branch_name, se.item_name ) AS subquery) AS totalRowCount FROM branch b INNER JOIN sports_equipment_order seo ON b.branch_no = seo.branch_no INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no WHERE seo.order_status = '승인' LIMIT 1;

SELECT se.item_name, SUM(seo.quantity) AS totalQuantity, SUM(CASE WHEN seo.quantity > 0 THEN seo.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS inventoryQuantity, SUM(CASE WHEN seo.quantity < 0 THEN seo.quantity ELSE 0 END) AS discartdQuantity FROM sports_equipment_order seo INNER JOIN sports_equipment se ON seo.sports_equipment_no = se.sports_equipment_no INNER JOIN branch b ON b.branch_no = seo.branch_no WHERE seo.order_status = '승인' AND b.branch_no = #{branchNo} AND se.sports_equipment_no = #{sportsEquipmentNo} GROUP BY se.item_name
